des:
[IMPORTANT] This application is only compatible with the new HUB PRO iO (installations from 2020).

With the Simon iO skill, you can control the lights, plug bases, blinds and heating of your home thanks to Amazon Alexa.

To enjoy the skill you must first have the Simon 100’s Socket HUB Pro iO activated.

To activate the HUB Pro iO Plug as well as the rest of the iO elements of your home such as the iO switches, iO dimmable switches, iO blind switches, iO sockets and iO thermostats you must do it through the Simon iO application.

Once you have registered and have them set up, by “ENABLE TO USE” you will be asked to link your account registered in the Simon iO application and give access to Amazon Alexa.

Once linked, depending on the devices you have you can use the following voice commands:

"Alexa, turn on the room light"
"Alexa, turn off the lamp"

“Alexa, increase table lights to 10%”
"Alexa, set dining room lights to 25%"

“Alexa, set thermostat to 25 degrees”
“Alexa, set thermostat to automatic”

"Alexa, turn on the floor lamp"
"Alexa, turn off the water heater"
"Alexa, turn on the radiator"

“Alexa, set blinds at 25%”
"Alexa, shut blinds"
"Alexa, raise blinds"
"Alexa, activate blinds"
